original_title: Et les autres, qu'est-ce qu'on en a à foutre?
overview: Shawn is a young gay teenager who discovered his sexuality. During a party with his best friend Mandy, he met an other boy, Ted. A love story between the two boys begins while Shawn's parents are not aware of the sexuality of their son.
title: Et les autres, qu'est-ce qu'on en a à foutre?
